about_the_game:
Step into Dungeonfell, a tactical team-based Roguelite where you lead a group of Delvers into ever-changing dungeons. Battle against hordes of Monsters and uncover the corruption lurking deep within the dungeon’s heart.

Learn the unique abilities of each Delver and unlock new spells and skills as you progress. Combine your Delvers strategically to create powerful synergies and overcome the dangers of the Dungeon’s depths.

Gameplay

• Assemble your team from a roster of unique Delvers.

• Fight through each biome of the Dungeon, taking on monsters in tactical battles.

• Choose your route through, focusing on different difficulties and rewards.

• Spend hard earned Gold to unlock new Delvers and progress through their skill tree.

Being a Roguelite, Dungeonfell has endless replayability. Each run is different, and knowledge is key if you want to master the ever-evolving tactical depth. Battle for glory as you work to cleanse the corruption at the heart of the dungeons.

Dungeon Mastery

• Complete Adventures and unlock ever more difficult Corruption levels to test your abilities.

• Learn each Delver’s strengths and weaknesses, explore every combination of team composition, and find your play style.

• Master the Cosmic Delver Map: an expansive skill tree to work though to unlock skills, abilities, relics, and more!

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: macOS 15 Sequoia
  • Processor: Apple M2
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: macOS 15 Sequoia
  • Processor: Apple M3
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

name: Dungeonfell

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10/11
  • Processor: 3.20 GHzQuad Core
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 660 or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10/11
  • Processor: 3.60 GHzQuad Core
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 1080 or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
